original_title: The Allman Brothers Band: Live at the Beacon Theatre
overview: Rock legends the Allman Brothers perform live at New York City's Beacon Theatre in this three-hour set filmed live in March 2003. Highlights include "Midnight Rider," "Whippin' Post," "Statesboro Blues," "Desdemona" and "A Change Is Gonna Come."
title: The Allman Brothers Band: Live at the Beacon Theatre
